![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc172_white-arrow-right.png)
# Manage your claims efficiently with AI
Our AI **predicts denials** and **proactively fixes claims** , so your billing team never has to worry about not getting paid. 
[Schedule a Demo!](https://www.cairhealth.com/<https:/calendly.com/ishan-pi4/cair-health-intro>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b24144a63610ec696097a8_Cair%20Product%20Dashboard.png)
![A nice gradient shape](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc269_hero-gradient.png)
![Glass abstract](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc25d_glass-abstract-black.png)
## Trusted & backed by leaders in healthcare
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b24361485bba8b55cfd19f_FQHC-white.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b3574307ebc1815873479b_Screenshot_2025-02-17_at_9.35.03_AM-removebg-preview.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b245c99a4f36b34db4ce98_45c67c89-417c-4c06-9dc4-dff29d371d41.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b2c0e4880ce83f486f4bba_675ca13d-4f30-4a93-9ca2-b8ab5d086532.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b246fedb0bda26bd72586b_e698f594-f92a-4e46-96b1-0ba4b182047c.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b2c1e7b395fd7a5de6b7df_output-onlinepngtools.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b2463ea8e69583e92562d0_391399b6-4378-47b9-a5a4-118e955a401e.png)
![Category show image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc189_category-show-image.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc1e5_quick-show-card-icon-1.png)
Autonomous Coding
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc1fd_quick-show-card-icon-2.png)
Claims Approvals
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc1e9_quick-show-card-icon-3.png)
Denials Management
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc19d_quick-show-card-icon-4.png)
Eligibilty Requests
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc200_quick-show-card-icon-5.png)
AI Phone Calls
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc1b1_quick-show-card-icon-6.png)
Real-time Payer Policies
![Feature image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc260_feature-two-item-image-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b29d0def7b2558888775e1_Screenshot%202025-02-16%20at%208.17.36%20PM-modified%20\(1\).png)![Feature glass abstract image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc261_feature-two-sub-image-1.png)
Claim Submissions & Approval
## Get claims approved on the first-pass
Our LLM Agent for claims processing scans through your clinical notes, payer policies, real-time eligibility data, coding rules, and more — making sure every claim is compliant and ready to be reimbursed!
[](https://www.cairhealth.com/</feature>)
Denials Management
## Manage your denials in seconds.
Our AI Agent for denials management streamlines the appeals process by automatically retrieving ERAs from payers, analyzing claim issues, and generating a revised, ready-to-submit 837. It even contacts the payer if necessary—to ensure faster claim resolution.
[](https://www.cairhealth.com/</feature>)
![Feature glass abstract image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc25f_feature-two-sub-image-3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b2c53f4a38dd7ff0438fc8_Screenshot%202025-02-16%20at%2011.11.35%20PM-modified.png)
![A chart to show your budget](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc250_feature-two-item-image-2.png)![Feature glass abstract image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc25e_feature-two-sub-image-4.png)![a tiny card to show one month revenue](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc251_Indicator%20Details.png)
Revenue Collection
## Maximize A/R collections & prevent leakage
Our AI detects underpayments, missed opportunities, and claim errors in real time, ensuring full reimbursement. We monitor your payer contracts and historical claims data to prevent leakage and reduces write-offs.
[](https://www.cairhealth.com/</feature>)
Approval
## We'll integrate your data & make sure it's safe.
### Your data is secure with us.
The Cair platform is **HIPAA** & **SOC II compliant** and none of your data will be stored, shared, or trained on by LLMs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b34d6ccc93714253ad9821_Screenshot%202025-02-17%20at%208.53.04%20AM-modified.png)![Integration feature glass abstract image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc263_integration-feature-sub-image.png)
### Our platform works with 80+ Integrations
Seamlessly **sync your EHR or claims data** via easy-to-use APIs. We can work with raw notes, x12 EDI files, FHIR resources, and your EHR APIs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b353ef323de82182b6e65f_Screenshot_2025-02-17_at_9.19.44_AM-removebg-preview.png)![A nice gradient border](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc19e_integration-feature-item-border.png)
AI RCM
## Revamp your claims pipeline in 2 weeks
[Schedule a Demo Now!](https://www.cairhealth.com/<#https://calendly.com/ishan-pi4/cair-health-intro>)
1
### Integrate your claims data
Within a few days, the Cair team will develop a hassle-free way to automatically sync your claims & clinical data with the Cair platform. 
2
### Set up custom rules
Our claims AI Agent will closely follow every rule you set in our platform. Don't want to use a certain modifier? Need an LMN? Just add a rule once!
3
### Invite your billing team & create worklists
Add your expert billers and configure dynamic worklists. Our AI will automatically assign new claims to your team members & generate daily to-do-lists!
## "With Cair Health's specialized revenue cycle AI LLMs, you receive automation matching the accuracy of a professional biller, across any specialty or service type."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b23bd960c849a141ba2f56_1516610078839-removebg-preview.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67b20cc8bf0024304f0cc069/67b20cc9bf0024304f0cc1ea_%E2%80%9C.png)
### Robert Rupp
Revenue Cycle Consultant at New Jersey FQHC

generated_description:
Cair Health is a pioneering company founded in 2023 and currently part of Y Combinator's S23 batch. With a compact team of six, it’s based in an undisclosed location and fully focused on revolutionizing the medical claims process through predictive analytics and automation.

The company’s mission is clear: to enhance the efficiency of medical claims management using cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Their AI solutions are designed to proactively predict denials and rectify claims, effectively freeing billing teams from the incessant worry of unpaid claims. This positions Cair Health as a vital partner for healthcare providers looking to optimize revenue cycles and minimize administrative burdens.

Backed by notable investors like Y Combinator, Foundation Capital, and Soma Capital, Cair Health is interwoven in the health-tech landscape, focusing on key areas such as healthcare, health insurance, and machine learning. The technology they offer automates tasks like denials management, claims approvals, and eligibility requests, providing a scalable solution for healthcare organizations looking to streamline their operations.

Cair’s platform ensures compliance with HIPAA and SOC II standards, highlighting its commitment to data security. It also supports over 80 integrations, allowing seamless synchronization with existing electronic health record (EHR) systems. The user experience is enhanced through customized setups, where clients can create rules that the AI follows, adapting to specific organizational needs.

If you're intrigued by the promise of smarter claims management, Cair Health invites you to explore their platform further. As they put it, revamping your claims pipeline can be achieved in just two weeks. For those keen to learn more, demo sessions are available to showcase how their solutions can reshape the transparency and efficiency of revenue cycle management in healthcare.

In a nutshell, Cair Health is not just another startup; it's a bold venture at the intersection of healthcare and technology, aiming to usher in a new era of proactive financial management for health organizations. Check them out [here](https://www.cairhealth.com/).
